£añcuch

Bardzo dziwny artefakt. Generuje bardzo silne pole grawitacyjne, gdy nic go nie dotyka. Nie posiada ¿adnych u¿ytecznych w³aœciwoœci, bardzo ciê¿ki. Ceniony przez kolekcjonerów spoza Zony.

Atom

Rzadka, piêkna, abnormalna formacja. Wygl¹dem przypomina atom. Emituje ciep³o. Nie posiada ¿adnych u¿ytecznych w³aœciwoœci, nie promienuje. Wysoce ceniony przez kolekcjonerów.

Latarnia

Grudka supergêstej substancji. Zawiera wartoœciwoe materia³y u¿ywane w produkcji, so there is a huge demand for it in the area unaffected by the Zone. Not radioactive, Has no useful properties.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Wêze³

A necessary condition for the generation of this artefact is the close impact of a thermal anomaly. It has a bizarre appearance and is therefore appreciated by collectors. Not radioactive, Has no useful properties.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Blizna

The artefact has a calming effect on the human nervous system. Also very valued by jewellers. Has no useful properties. Generates a very weak gravitational and electric field. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Piaskowiec

An artefact, which is formed in zones with extreme temperatures. Has no useful properties and Not radioactive. Does not attract collectors or jewellers, but it contains a small amount of gold, so it has some value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Kwas

A hollow spherical formation resembling a transparent parchment of some sorts. Covered with a layer of film, pleasant to the touch. Has no useful properties, Not radioactive. Valued by collectors.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Czarny Anio³

A root-like artefact. When not in contact with anything, it lets out a bit of steam from it's surface. Very valued by collectors. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Winogrono

Amber-like substance of a slight greenish hue. As a result of powerful anomalies it is very heavy. Very valued by collectors. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Czaszka Sk¹pca

Very light and fragile artefact. Has absolutely no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Gwiazda Widmowa

Formed from an Anomaly. It is a plasma-like substance in a transparent pulsating shell. Generates a weak gravitational field. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Medal

It is a small hoop with four embedded parts of a streamlined triangular shape, which have two pairs of opposite charges arbitrarily changing their location within the design. Valued by collectors. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Ksiê¿yc

Crescent-shaped artefact. Generates a very dim light. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive. Has some value to collectors and jewellers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Generator

This artefact generates weak electric currents and an electromagnetic field. It is a source of energy and therefore very much valued outside the perimeter. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Kula

There is no data on the conditions under which this round artefact is formed, hence the name, but practice shows that it is most often found in places of increased electrical activity. Very agile and bouncy artefact. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Lampa

An artefact with electric properties. Emits some energy and glows. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive. Quite interesting for collectors.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Tasiemiec

This is pure silicon dioxide, if we exclusively take into account the atomic mass of matter. Displays strange behaviour. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Mech

An electric artefact. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive. Has no value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Serafin

An artefact of electric nature. Generates a temporary gravitational field. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Elektron

This artefact is a product of electrical anomalies. Very heavy. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive. Very valued beyond the perimeter.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Szpon

A beautiful glass-like formation from electrostatic anomalies. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive. Has no value beyond the perimeter.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Bazyliszek

One of the few artefacts in the Zone, which copes well with all kinds of physical influences on its owner.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Hel

A bright (literally) representative of the family of electrostatic artefacts. It gives off a gaseous substance that has a beneficial effect on the body. Due to its high efficiency, it is in large demand.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Œwider

Bowl-shaped petals of the artefact release a powerful gaseous stimulant. The result of which is a positive change in human hormones.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Oko Smoka

The artefact is mostly formed in fiery anomalies and has the appearance of a reptile's eye. Has no useful properties. Not radioactive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] bezu¿yteczne
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] brak mo¿liwoœci umieszczenia w pojemniku
Oko Noosfery

One of the most mysterious artefacts in the Zone, the Eye of the Noosphere can transport its wielder back in time, even to escape death. A tight squeeze of the artefact activates its ability, creating a restoration point to go back to on activation or death. Frequent use can cause the artefact to change colour, but if discharged too frequently it may cease to function altogether. The Eye gradually restores its power over time, supposedly being fuelled by the anomalous energy of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]W£AŒCIWOŒCI:
 %c[ui_white] • %c[0,255,215,0] superartefact
